mapper.select:
SELECT eo.offer_id, eo.offer_no, i.item_name, i.item_id, customer.customer_name, elev.num, FORMAT(eo.total,'000,000.00') as total, u.NAME USERNAME, eo.instance_id, eo.instance_status, eo.offer_user FROM tb_e_offer AS eo LEFT JOIN tb_item AS i ON eo.item_id = i.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_core UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_merchant UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_ordinary ) AS customer ON i.customer_no = customer.customer_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT *, COUNT(id) AS num FROM tb_elevator_details GROUP BY item_id ) AS elev ON eo.item_id = elev.item_id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS u ON eo.offer_user = u.USER_ID where 1=1
and i.item_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pd.item_name}),'%')
and (u.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pd.user_name}),'%') or u.NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pd.user_name}),'%') )
and eo.instance_status LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pd.instance_status}),'%')
and eo.offer_user in
${user_id}
order by eo.offer_date desc

SELECT i.*, customer.customer_name,COUNT(ed.id) as ednum,us.NAME USERNAME FROM tb_item AS i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_core UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_merchant UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_ordinary ) AS customer ON i.customer_no = customer.customer_no LEFT JOIN tb_elevator_details as ed ON i.item_id=ed.item_id LEFT JOIN sys_user as us ON i.input_user=us.USER_ID WHERE (case when (select count(1) from tb_so_contract tcontract where tcontract.HT_ITEM_ID=i.item_id )>0 then '5' when (select count(1) from tb_e_offer tbjc where tbjc.item_id=i.item_id)>0 then '2' WHEN i.item_status='11' THEN '11' else '1' end) ='1' and ((item_approval='4' and is_cross_region='1') or (is_cross_region='0'))
and i.item_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.item_name}),'%')
and i.input_user in
${user_id}
GROUP BY i.item_id ORDER BY i.input_date DESC
SELECT * from sys_util where id=#{id}

SELECT * from ( select BJC_ITEM_ID,sum(SBSJZJ) as SBSJZJ,sum(ZGYJ) as ZGYJ,sum(YJZE) as YJZE from TB_BJC where BJC_ITEM_ID=#{item_id} and offer_version=#{offer_version}) as a LEFT JOIN (select * from sys_util where id=#{id}) as b ON 1=1

SELECT i.*, customer.customer_name FROM tb_item AS i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_core UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_merchant UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_ordinary ) AS customer ON i.customer_no = customer.customer_no where item_no=#{item_no}

SELECT i.*, customer.customer_name FROM tb_item AS i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_core UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_merchant UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_ordinary ) AS customer ON i.customer_no = customer.customer_no where item_id=#{item_id}

SELECT eo.*, i.*, customer.customer_name FROM tb_e_offer as eo LEFT JOIN tb_item as i ON eo.item_id=i.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_core UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_merchant UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_ordinary ) AS customer ON i.customer_no = customer.customer_no WHERE offer_no = #{offer_no}
SELECT * FROM tb_e_offer WHERE offer_no = #{offer_no}
SELECT * FROM WHERE item_id = #{item_id}
SELECT offer_version FROM tb_e_offer WHERE item_id = #{item_id} ORDER BY offer_version+0 DESC limit 0,1;

SELECT ed.id, ed.no, ed.item_id, m.models_name, m.models_id, m.elevator_id, COUNT(models_name) as modelsNum, COUNT(IF(flag='1',flag,NULL)) as WNum, COUNT(IF(flag='2',flag,NULL)) as YNum FROM tb_elevator_details as ed LEFT JOIN (select models_id,elevator_id,models_name from tb_models ) as m ON ed.models_id=m.models_id WHERE item_id = #{pd.item_id} and offer_version = #{pd.offer_version} GROUP BY models_name
SELECT ed.id as elevID FROM tb_elevator_details as ed WHERE flag = "1" AND ed.models_id = #{models_id} AND ed.item_id = #{item_id}
SELECT offer_no,offer_date FROM tb_e_offer ORDER BY offer_date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT FEIYUE_ID,OPT_ICKZKSB FROM tb_feiyue WHERE ITEM_ID=#{item_id}
SELECT FEIYUEMRL_ID,OPT_ICKZKSB FROM tb_feiyue_mrl WHERE ITEM_ID=#{item_id}
SELECT FEIYANG_ID,OPT_ICKZKSB FROM tb_feiyang WHERE ITEM_ID=#{item_id}
SELECT FEIYANGMRL_ID,OPT_ICKZKSB FROM tb_feiyang_mrl WHERE ITEM_ID=#{item_id}
SELECT FEIYANGXF_ID,OPT_ICKZKSB FROM tb_feiyang_xf WHERE ITEM_ID=#{item_id}
select escalator_standard_price from tb_escalator_standard where id in( select es_id from tb_escalator_config where id=#{id})
select name from tb_escalator_config where id=#{id}
select * from tb_elevator_keyword where keyword=#{keyword}
select price_type from tb_elevator_keyword where keyword=#{keyword} limit 1
select price,unit,price_type,remark,dlvr_date from tb_elevator_keyword where keyword=#{keyword} and param=#{param}

select sum(price) as price from tb_elevator_keyword where keyword =#{keyword} and param in
#{param}
select formula,unit,price_type,remark,dlvr_date from tb_elevator_keyword where keyword=#{keyword}
select price,unit,price_type,remark,dlvr_date from tb_elevator_keyword where keyword=#{keyword}
